subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Seimone Augustus scored a season-high 26 points, the rookie Devereaux Peters added 18, and the Minnesota Lynx got back on track by routing the New York Liberty, 102-70.
snippet: Seimone Augustus scored a season-high 26 points, the rookie Devereaux Peters added 18, and the Minnesota Lynx got back on track by routing the New York Liberty, 102-70.
